categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Riyan Kiner's Hovel was a small hovel located on the planet Corellia during the time of the Galactic Civil War. It was owned by a mentally unstable retired adventurer turned terrorist named Riyan Kiner. From there, the insane crate-hating Riner attacked the crate manufacturing company Joben Crate Company and planted bombs at hotels across the galaxy. The retired explorer threatened even more carnage if the production of crates should continue. However, his plan was foiled by a spacer working for Corellia Times reporter Vani Korr. After disarming the bombs, the spacer tracked Riyan Kiner to his hovel and eventually killed him in the confrontation.

Riyan Kiner's Hovel was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011. Riyan Kiner's Hovel was added to the game with the update dubbed "Chapter 10: The Search for the Meatlump King", released on June 19, 2008.
